zhCN: 传奇造诣
enGB: Legendary Prowess

zhCN: 你的属性增强加值＋2（最高＋6）
enGB: Increase your enhancement bonuses to any ability score by 2 (max 6).

zhCN: 盾牌大师
enGB: Shieldmaster

zhCN: 使用护盾时，你的增强加值不会被分割。相反最大增强加值同时应用于你的盾牌与护甲，在4级＋1，9级＋2，依此类推。
enGB: Your enhancement bonus is not split when using a shield. Instead, the maximum enhancement bonus is applied to both your armor and your shield. At level 4 it is +1, at level 9 it is +2, and so on.

zhCN: 成对武器
enGB: Twin Weapons

zhCN: 使用多把武器时，你的增强加值不会被分割。相反最大增强加值同时应用于你的所有武器，在4级＋1，9级＋2，依此类推。
enGB: Your enhancement bonus is not split when using multiple weapons. Instead, the maximum enhancement bonus is applied to all your weapons. At level 4 it is +1, at level 9 it is +2, and so on.

zhCN: 传奇属性
enGB: Legendary Ability

zhCN: 在任意属性上获得+1内在加值。你可以多次选择本传奇赐福，且它可以叠加在任一属性上，最多+5。
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to any ability score. You can select this up to 5 times for each ability score.

zhCN: 传奇力量
enGB: Legendary Strength

zhCN: 获得＋1力量内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to strength. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.

zhCN: 传奇敏捷
enGB: Legendary Dexterity

zhCN: 获得＋1敏捷内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to dexterity. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.

zhCN: 传奇体质
enGB: Legendary Constitution

zhCN: 获得＋1体质内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to constitution. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.

zhCN: 传奇智力
enGB: Legendary Intelligence

zhCN: 获得＋1智力内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Intelligence. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.

zhCN: 传奇感知
enGB: Legendary Wisdom

zhCN: 获得＋1感知内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Wisdom. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.

zhCN: 传奇魅力
enGB: Legendary Charisma

zhCN: 获得＋1魅力内在加值，这个选项最多＋5
enGB: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Charisma. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
